file_content.text: You did leave quite a mess, but I'll be glad to get working again.
Your dig site is clear.
Marvelous! I'll start gathering my team before any carrion eaters start taking root.
The Reclamation Service owes you its esteemed gratitude.
Good luck ousting those vagrants.
I don't suppose I could interest a few of the Empire's finest in a genuine slaughter?
Any chance I could interest you in a little punitive bloodshed, my lord?
I don't suppose Intelligence has dispatched you to bury my problems?
Looking for someone to shoot?
There's a team of Republic archaeologists excavating the same ruins I'm here to research.
My team attempted to run them off, but... it's rather embarrassing, we were the ones sent packing.
You're hoping I'll teach these trespassers a lesson.
Can't have that, can we?
You were beaten by a gang of historians?
How did that happen?
We were prepared for a paltry armed escort. The Republic Special Forces group traveling with them.... We're lucky to be alive.
Could have been worse.
We need to make a show of force. Make it clear that to steal from the Empire is to sign your own death warrant.
Spill enough blood and the Republic will be hard-pressed to find anyone crazy enough to replace them.
You understand what you're asking. It will get messy.
You'll have a lot to clean up.
I won't mind digging through their bones if it means working in peace.
How about another solution?
If you say so. As long as we get that dig site back.
Disgusting. [Refuse quest]
But--I thought... I'm sorry to have bothered you.
What I wouldn't give for a transfer back to Korriban.
